item.title: Has BMW Ventures Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, BMW Ventures Ltd has declared a 15% dividend with an ex-date of February 10, 2026. However, the company has shown minimal returns over various periods, with many showing no price or dividend returns. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has Jubilant Ingrevia Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Jubilant Ingrevia Ltd has declared a dividend of 250% (₹2.5 per share) with an ex-date of July 25, 2025. While recent total returns have been negative over shorter periods, the company has shown positive returns over longer durations. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has Uno Minda Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Uno Minda Ltd has declared a dividend of 45%, amounting to ₹0.74 per share, with an ex-date of February 12, 2025. The company has demonstrated positive total returns across various periods, reflecting strong performance. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has Page Industries Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Page Industries Ltd has declared a dividend of 1250% (₹125 per share) with an ex-date of February 11, 2026. While the dividend yield is 1.75%, total returns have been mixed, showing negative performance in most periods except for the last five years, which saw a total return of 28.36%. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has Power Finance Corporation Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Power Finance Corporation Ltd has declared a 40% dividend, with an ex-date of February 20, 2026, and a dividend yield of 3.45%. The company has demonstrated strong total returns across various periods, including a total return of 304.98% over the last 3 years. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has CCL Products (India) Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, CCL Products (India) Ltd has declared a dividend of 137%, amounting to ₹5 per share, with an ex-date of February 10, 2026. The company has demonstrated strong total returns over various periods, reflecting a positive outlook for investors. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has Emami Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Emami Ltd. has declared a dividend of 600% (₹4 per share) with an ex-date of February 10, 2026. While recent short-term returns have been negative, the dividend contributes positively to total returns, especially over longer periods. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has Shivalik Bimetal Controls Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Shivalik Bimetal Controls Ltd has declared a 100% dividend, amounting to ₹1.5 per share, with an ex-date of February 13, 2026. While recent total returns have shown volatility, the company has experienced substantial growth over the long term, particularly a total return of nearly 995% over the past five years. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Transport Corporation of India Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Transport Corporation of India Ltd has declared a dividend of 450% (₹4.5 per share) with an ex-date of February 10, 2026. While recent total returns have been negative, the company has shown significant growth over longer periods, particularly a total return of 330.82% over the last 5 years. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Cummins India Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Cummins India Ltd. has declared a dividend of 1000% (₹33.5 per share), with an ex-date of February 11, 2026. The company has shown strong total returns across various periods, including 49.94% over the past year. Time: Feb 06 2026 11:30 PM IST
